messages.subject: analyzing, making choices, mindful parenting
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I think your analyzing too much. Just go with life and it  will all fall into place.-=- The purpose of this list is to discuss what helps unschooling work
messages.messageBody:
-=-I think
your analyzing too much. Just go with life and it will all fall into
place.-=-



The purpose of this list is to discuss what helps unschooling work better.
Advising against analysis might be good for a teaparty list, but not for
this one.

"Just go with life" is what most people do.
Parenting mindfully and making conscious choices based on principles isn't
quite as simple as just going with life. Some people just go with their lives
and end up in prison.

Sandra






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
